sentences.en: Application: Suitable for desiccation, medical treatment and poultry artificial incubation.
sentences.cn: 用途: 干燥 、 医疗和家禽人工孵化.

sentences.en: Article 68 Incubation period of the plague is 6 days.
sentences.cn: 第六十八条鼠疫的潜伏期为6日.

sentences.en: Article 84 Incubation period of yellow fever is 6 days.
sentences.cn: 第八十四条黄热病的潜伏期为6日.

sentences.en: Finally the mechanism of intuition and incubation effect was illustrated.
sentences.cn: 创造性问题的解决离不开内隐认知和隐性知识.

sentences.en: Incubation bottles with ground - glass stoppers are utilized.
sentences.cn: 使用带 毛玻璃 塞子的培养瓶.

sentences.en: Incubation was no longer necessary , and the eggs were carefully placed in the special shed.
sentences.cn: 布子不须再“窝”了, 很小心地放在“蚕房”里.

sentences.en: It is caused during development by high incubation temperatures.
sentences.cn: 这是在发育阶段由高温孵化造成的。

sentences.en: Learn about the rewards and potential pitfalls of student - led incubation.
sentences.cn: 了解学生领导的孵化器所面临的报酬和潜在的陷阱.

sentences.en: Male albatrosses share in the incubation of eggs.

sentences.cn: 在4℃保温60分钟,NPA的结合量达最高点,平衡状态至少可维持2小时.

sentences.en: One of the things that I think about often is how do I cultivate a culture in my team that encourages, empowers and rewards/recognizes incubation efforts.
sentences.cn: 怎样在我的团队中培养一种文化来鼓励、授权、奖励并认可大家在孵化项目中付出的努力是我经常考虑的事情之一。

sentences.en: Resourcing incubation has to be a part of planning – otherwise the natural tendency is to suck up all the resources for the critical activity of the day.
sentences.cn: 为孵化项目分配资源必须是计划的一部分，否则所有的资源都会被日常紧要事务所占用，这是自然的趋势。

sentences.en: The four stages of creative thought are preparation, incubation, illumination, and verification.
sentences.cn: 创造性思考的四个阶段是准备 、 沉思 、 启迪 、 求证.

sentences.en: The illness has an incubation period of up to 11 days.
sentences.cn: 该病有长达11天的潜伏期。

sentences.en: The incubation period is most frequently between 7 to 21 days.
The incubation period usually is 8 to 14 days.
